name: Super Marine Pirates
description:
Like a treasure on the deep seabed, this game was lost for decades. But now it has been rescued from the depths and restored by a small team. After many long nights and many cups of coffee, the time has come to bring it to the public; The long lost game "Super Marine Pirates"!

Controls:


MoveShootRepairOpen ShopBuy in ShopController

Left Stick / D-PadL1, R1West-, South-, East- ButtonsNorth ButtonD-PadKeyboard

W, A, S, DQ, ELeft, Down, RightUpW, A, S, D

Credits:
Art: Grau
Code: Dino
Sounds: Dino & Grau
Music: "12okt" released by Nooskewl Games under CC0
Cover: "Wager's Action off Cartagena" by Samuel Scott
